word_mean: 〔NA〕小脑：是脑干后面的后脑部分，位于颅后窝，表面有沟裂，由一个正中叶(蚓部)和两个侧叶(半球)组成，以三对脚与脑干相连。小脑的功能是协调运动

sentence.Network_en: This part of the vertebrate brain has two divisions, the medulla and the cerebellum.
sentence.Network_cn: 脊椎动物脑子的这一部分可分为两部分:脑髓和小脑.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion NPY immunoreactive neurons are located in cerebellum Purkinje cell layer.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论　小脑Purkinje细胞层内存在NYP阳性神经元.

sentence.Network_en: Pontine nucleus ( PN ) is the most important relayed nucleus between cerebrum and cerebellum.
sentence.Network_cn: 桥核是大、小脑之间最重要的中继核团.
